adHeader: Piano Tuner - Tuning on day of call possible -
adDetails: Piano Tuner: Thomas Penders show contact info Website: http://thomaspenders.musicaneo.com/ To keep your piano in good condition you should have it tuned every 6 months. Text, email or call for fast scheduling. Tuning a piano takes about 1 to 1 and half hour. When is it time for a tuning? * Tune the piano after moving it. * Tune the piano before a recital or event. * Tune the piano before selling it * Tune the piano when the seasons change. Website: http://thomaspenders.musicaneo.com/
